label: codesearch: search
command: bash -c 'r=$(tv codesearch) && [[ -n "$r" ]] && file=$(echo "$r" | cut -d: -f1) && line=$(echo "$r" | cut -d: -f2) && zed "$file:$line"'

label: codesearch: symbol context
command: bash -c 'r=$(codesearch context "$ZED_SYMBOL" --format vimgrep | tv) && [[ -n "$r" ]] && file=$(echo "$r" | cut -d: -f1) && line=$(echo "$r" | cut -d: -f2) && zed "$file:$line"'

label: codesearch: impact analysis
command: bash -c 'r=$(codesearch impact "$ZED_SYMBOL" --format vimgrep | tv) && [[ -n "$r" ]] && file=$(echo "$r" | cut -d: -f1) && line=$(echo "$r" | cut -d: -f2) && zed "$file:$line"'
